name: Friend Material
description:
DO YOU WANT TO MAKE ONE (1) FRIENDS IN THE HIT TOP DOWN EXPERIENCE EVERYONE IS TALKING ABOUT? 

DOWNLOAD TO DO THAT.

FEATURES:

1-2 HOURS OF GAMEPLAY (even less if you skip text!)

STORY I GUESS

FULLY STOLEN SOUNDTRACK IN .OGG FORMAT (I did not license them, take down the game I dare you.)

GRAPHICS

CLASSIC GAMEPLAY FOR A NEW GENERATOR OF GAMEING

NON-ENCRYPTED GAME DATA (browse the game files I don't care)

CRUST

HOW TO ACCESS GAME:

1 - DOUBLE CLICK BLUE APPLICATION FILE

2 - EXTRACT FILES

3 - DOUBLE CLICK "Game" APPLICATION, NOT THE CONIFGURATION SETTINGS OR PROJECT FILE

4 - SEND ME YOUR CREDIT CARD INFORMATION via TWITER DMs

5 - PLAY THE GAME

CONTROLS:

WASD - MOVE

Z - SELECT/INTERACT

X - CANCEL/OPEN MENU

ALT + F4 - ENABLE CHEATS

I made this like 3 years ago and I still like maybe 2 of the ideas so here it is. Please be gentle it is not the best.
